SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.util.string

Class RichString

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.util.string.RichString
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class RichString extends Object implements Serializable
An immutable string with a color and format.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form
